RETURNDATA.OVERVIEW_CONTENT: Contains a list of all charts, every row contains the File ID, Chart name, view chart button, edit chart button, delete chart

ITEM_DATA.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: Press view chart button to see chart details you can press Back button to get back to flow charts list
Allows you to delete a chart by hit the delete button
Allows you to edit the chart and change the view or chart name or chart structure , you can choose how you want to see the chart
